mapper.select: /* ManagerMapper.selectManagerDetail */ SELECT A.MANAGER_NO , A.MANAGER_ID , A.MANAGER_PW , A.MANAGER_NM , A.AUTH_CODE , A.MANAGER_STATUS , A.MANAGER_STATUS_DT , A.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , A.LOGIN_LAST_DT , A.PW_CHANGE_DT , A.PW_TEMP_DT , A.REG_USER , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM MANAGER_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANAGER_ID = #{managerId} AND MANAGER_STATUS = '0000'

/* ManagerMapper.selectManagerList */ SELECT A.MANAGER_NO , A.MANAGER_ID , A.MANAGER_PW , A.MANAGER_NM , A.AUTH_CODE , A.MANAGER_STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(A.MANAGER_STATUS_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS MANAGER_STATUS_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.LOGIN_LAST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LOGIN_LAST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.PW_CHANGE_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS PW_CHANGE_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.PW_TEMP_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS PW_TEMP_DT , A.LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , A.REG_USER , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY_MST B WHERE A.MANAGER_NO = B.MANAGER_NO AND B.STATUS ='1000') AS WAIT_CNT FROM MANAGER_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANAGER_STATUS = '0000' AND A.AUTH_CODE = '0001'
